itunes:title: 239 - The 10 Business Books That Saved Me & Their 10 Secrets
itunes:author: alex sugg, andy j pizza, yoni wolf, andy j miller, chris graham
itunes:summary:
My creative career was a mess before I started reading business books. I'm not some crazy reader either, it doesn't take a ton of business books to change everything for your creative career, it just takes the RIGHT ONES.

In this episode I share my top 10 favorite business books and the top lesson from each one that enabled me to build a creative career that I absolutely love.
itunes:subtitle:

itunes:keywords: marketing, mindset, carol dweck, seth godin, gary vaynerchuck, the one thing, business book, gary vee, jon acuff, andy stanley, simon sinek, jab jab jab right hook, heros journey, ryan holiday, creative career, michael hyatt, joseph campbell, purple cow
